name: fancy-pants
description: A performant JavaScript Micro-lib for Custom Elements with reactive updates via dirty tracking
author: Devin Weaver (@sukima) <suki@tritarget.org> (https://tritarget.org/)

scripts.deploy: yarn lint:js && make clean && NODE_ENV=production make && gh-pages -d docs
scripts.watch: find lib examples static jsdoc.json preamble.txt README.md -type f | entr make
